Miraku

Korean: 미라쿠

Tokyo

Blood type:

Group (2024-present):
NouerA

Introduction

Miraku is a Japanese singer under Nouer Entertainment. He is the maknae of the boy group NouerA.

He is known for being a contestant on the Japanese survival show Nizi Project 2 and the South Korean survival show MAKE MATE 1.
